name: Wonder Princess-Chic Fairy Salon
description:
Wonder Princess is a beauty dressup and salon game for girls.
Three different kinds of girls is here wait for you to dressup for them!Have a really amazing time playing this exciting new dress up game called Wonder Princess!

Game Features:
- Exquisite and fluent flash,adorable and cute drawings
- Lively scenes design,nice background music
- Simple game with funny operations
- Fun,educational,and absolutely adorable
- Easy and funny.Children will learn more and develop kids initiative consciousness
